name: start here
template:
Welcome to the first station of your QuestTour
This will guide you around the DoESLiverpool 
hackspace.

name: display
template:
This is the display case of stuff 
people in DoESLiverpool have built.

name: heat press
template:
Here is the heat press for making T-shirt designs
There is also a mug press.  It uses sublimation
printing to transfer the ink from the paper to
the product.

name: coffee
template:
If the coffee pot is empty you can
select Next2 for a step-by-step guide
to fill it.

name: make coffee
template: make coffee

name: donations
template: This is the donations box

name: end
template:
You are at the end
Thank you for participating
We hope you enjoyed this adventure

name: displayhg
template:
This, for example, is a piece of machined
aluminium that is used to hold the nose wires
of a hang-glider

Press Next2 to skip to next area

name: displayvis
template:
During the pandemic DoESLiverpool produced
visors for local health care institutes

name: vinyl cutter
template:
If you have a 2D design, this machine can cut
it out of vinyl that you can stick onto things

name: 3Dprinter
template:
One of the many 3D printers working in the
space.  We charge only the cost of materials.

name: metalworkshop
template:
Stay out.  This place is dangerous.
You might suffocate from the lack of
oxygen or be shredded by the machines.

name: lasercutting
template:
The laser cutting is all done in this room
because the machines are noisy.
It's boring work because you are not allowed
to leave them unattended due to fire risk.
If they are in use, go in and ask the people
what they are making.

name: solderstation
template:
We do all our soldering at this desk.
There probably isn't much to see here.

name: sewingroom
template:
Go in here for the sewing room.
We don't have time to give a proper
tour of it right now.

name: filters
template: the filters are in this cupboard
